name: Racing Tanks!
description:
Racing Tanks is a short local multiplayer game in which you fight against your friends in a very short race.

You'll be in a random generated maze each round in which you'll have to find a way to reach the goal before your opponent, but be careful, because sometimes you'll have to eliminate your opponent first in order to make the goal accessible.

Meet the crew!

Choose Darkar, the best soldier in the crew!
He has the top tank, which can handle more hits, has just enough ammo to finish his opponents and has two bombs, but he's generally slower because of all of his armament

Or choose the cute general Skyty!
Skyty has a faster tank, more ammo, and a super fast bomb, but her tank can't handle too many hits and she only has one bomb.

Racing Tanks also includes a single-player mode in which you can play against an AI, so you can practice your strategies for when you'll face your friends or just to have a great time with the crew!

Get your gear ready in this exciting race!

Characters:
  • Darkar has 4 medium speed bullets, two slow bombs, slow movement speed and 5 HP.
  • Skyty has 6 high speed bullets, one fast bomb, high movement speed and 4 HP.

Features:
  • Local multiplayer for 2 players.
  • Single-player mode against an AI.
  • Five game modes.
  • Party mode to mix all game modes.
  • Compatible with Steam Remote Play Together.

Welcome to the crew, soldier!
